content: I am using WithBot.lt.lt and WithBot.le.le for relationships over Option, but this is awkward with rw. I found out that Option has LT and LE instances, which seems to be identical. Is that correct? Would there be a reason to continue using WithBot's instances over Option's?
It's so you don't confuse WithBot with any other ordering you could put on Option
Also, WithBot has a lot more theorems around its order than Option
I see. I am not going to use WithTop, but I am using Option.map and Option.bind a lot. Should I completely switch to either of them?
Option has around two dozen lemmas around its order, and WithBot has over 400
We do have docs#WithBot.map, bot no analogue for bind
